title: Skin Bugs
body: There are two twisted fate skins, jack of hearts and high noon where they don't show the basic animation's instead of what the skin is supposed to show in the Oce servers, I would like them to be fixed please thanks :)

replies.body:
Hiya Just Jake - 

I'm not entirely sure what you're reporting on here. 

> don't show the basic animation's instead of what the skin is supposed to show

Would you mind clarifying what you mean by this?

Thanks! :)
